title: Under Kennedy, America’s Health Department Is in the Business of Promoting Kennedy
description: More detail on Health and Human Services chief serving his own financial interests and pet causes as opposed to those of the public.
content: Yves here. Remarkably, this article misses an issue that we have flagged more than once, that Kennedy like so many Trump officials, is profiteering from his office. Needless to say, that along with l… [+15528 chars]
